abstract: One of the striking aspects of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s critical public comments this week to Xi Jinping, the likely next leader of China, was how they contrasted with the Obama administration’s typical approach to China.
snippet: One of the striking aspects of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s critical public comments this week to Xi Jinping, the likely next leader of China, was how they contrasted with the Obama administration’s typical approach to China.
lead_paragraph: One of the striking aspects of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s critical public comments this week to Xi Jinping, the likely next leader of China, was how they contrasted with the Obama administration’s typical approach to China.

headline.main: Behind a White House Pivot on China

abstract: The companies will use $330 million to create Oriental DreamWorks, which will produce family entertainment.
snippet: The companies will use $330 million to create Oriental DreamWorks, which will produce family entertainment.
lead_paragraph: DreamWorks Animation on Friday announced a long-anticipated deal with three Chinese companies to form a family-entertainment studio in Shanghai.

headline.main: DreamWorks Animation Forms Studio With Chinese Partners
